entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Delta
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow and local blowing snow beginning this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
